titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on railway car body shells of stainless steel designed for use in gallery type cab control railway cars.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on railway car body shells of stainless steel designed for use in gallery type cab control railway cars.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on railway car body shells of stainless stell designed for use in gallery type cab control railway cars.
